value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
value.excerpt: You need an Embed Token for the Power BI Embedded Playground, but you don't want to write code. Adam shows you how to easily get an access token with no code using PowerShell.  Power BI Embedded Playground - https://microsoft.github.io/PowerBI-JavaScript/demo/ Power BI REST API - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/power-bi/

value.title: Embed a dashboard from Power BI into your application
value.excerpt: In this video, I go over the embed a dashboard sample and walk you through how to actually embed a dashboard into your application. This uses a combination of the Power BI REST APIs and the JavaScript API.  Embed Dashboards in Your Applications to Monitor Your Business in Context (Blog) - https://powerbi.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/embed-dashboard/

value.title: Power BI Secure Embed - a no code / low code option
value.excerpt: In this video, Patrick looks at the new Power BI Secure Embed. If you have been using Publish to Web internally, you need to look at this feature as it is the perfect replacement that adds a secure option for easy, frictionless, embedding.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Tracing with Log Analytics and Power BI
value.excerpt: With Log Analytics integration in Power BI, you can now capture Analysis Services trace events easily and over a longer period of time. Combined with the Power BI template report, you can gain a lot of insights into usage of your datasets. With more to come down the road!  Announcing long-term usage

value.title: Using Power BI reports from an end user perspective (2021)

value.title: What are Power BI data connectors and why should you care?

There are other benefits also to import Azure Active Directory (AAD) users loaded into Power BI for

value.title: Power BI Architecture Best Practice
value.excerpt: Using Power BI is simple. However, using it properly needs a good architecture. value.title: Power BI DAX   Previous Month to Date, Quarter to Date, and Year to Date Calculations
value.excerpt: If you want to compare the sales up to a particular day and compare it with the previous period (month, quarter, or year) but up to that particular day in that period, then it is called previous month-to-date, previous quarter-to-date, and previous year-to-date.
